description:
Contents:

- "Morale Boost" gesture

A rousing gesture you can use to cheer up your huntmates!

Enjoy communicating with other hunters and taking fun photos with this special gesture!

- After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the gesture. You will then be able to use the it in the Chat Menu.
- The "Morale Boost" gesture can also be obtained through gameplay progression.
name: "Morale Boost" gesture
